title: 1933년 Campbell 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Campbell. 판결일: 1933-12-01. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: American Bankers' Insurance Company v. Carroll Campbell.
**판결일**: 1933-12-01
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Combs

## 변호인

Adams & McAlister, of Nacogdoches, for plaintiff in error., Anderson & Lewis, of Center, for defendant in error.

## 인용

- 65 S.W.2d 1118

## 판결문 요약

This case is by writ of error from a judgment of the county court of Shelby county, Tex., dismissing a writ of certiorari sued out in that court by plaintiff in error to review a judgment of the justice court, precinct No. 1.
The amount in controversy, as reflected by the judgment, is $64.20. Since the amount in controversy is not within the jurisdiction of this court, the writ of error is dismissed at the cost of plaintiff in error. *Page 1119 ...
